short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The omnipresent comment section to discuss, fact-check, and share your views about any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The comment section of the internet.
With the LensView extension, read others thoughts on the web page with a single click.

• Fact-checking articles, blogs, news etc on the web
• Share your thoughts while browsing the web
• Share and view reviews on any e-commerce web page
• Show your appreciation towards developers and let them know you like their app
• Navigate the web securely, avoiding phishing pages and alert others of the same
• Discover cool and awesome online tools

This is an extension for LensView’s web application (https://lensview.io) and is an enhanced way of interacting with our product. 

LensView is built on Lens Protocol (https://www.lens.xyz/)

LensView is completely open source and free to use.
https://github.com/Blockchain-Kami/lensview-beta

Please refrain from using abusive language and misuse while interacting with LensView.
